document.title: OMBI-Nederlands-Arabisch
document.intro: OMBI-Dutch-Arabic is a reversible bilingual lexical file (in Dutch, OMBI, omkeerbare bilinguale bestanden) in which Dutch is the source language and Arabic the target language. OMBI-Dutch- Arabic can be used in computational applications s... OMBI is a tool for creating and editing bilingual dictionaries The OMBI bilingual resources have been developed by order of and under the auspices of the CLVV (Commissie voor Lexicografische Vertaalvoorzieningen), which was established by the Ministers of Education of both the Netherlands and Flanders in 1993. The chairman of the CLVV was Willy Mar... OMBI-Dutch-Arabic contains 37.000 entries

access.title: available for non-commercial and commercial organisations; user licence required
